snippet.title: Backbone Kickstarter Teaser - Pixel art noir adventure inspired by Vancouver
snippet.description:
Coming to Kickstarter on April 27th, 10AM PDT

SUPPORT US ON THUNDERCLAP NOW: https://www.thunderclap.it/projects/69565-backbone-live-on-kickstarter

Backbone is an upcoming pixel art adventure inspired by film noir and raccoon detectives. Learn more on our website and subscribe to the mailing list! https://eggnut.net/

Twitter - https://twitter.com/backbonegame
Reddit - https://www.reddit.com/r/backbone_game
VK - https://vk.com/backbonegame
